name: INSPIRED SPINE
description: Inspired Spine is a spine surgery practice.
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: Categorization of certain spinal surgery procedures and approaches into HCPCS/CPT codes.
